languages.text: "Ваша Светлость?" {n}Канцлер отрывается от чтения инфопластины.{/n} "Надеюсь, пребывание на Даргонусе положительно скажется на вашем физическом и моральном состоянии. Понимаю, у наследника протектората полно дел, но и об отдыхе не стоит забывать".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость?" {n}Канцлер отрывается от чтения инфопластины.{/n} "Надеюсь, пребывание на Даргонусе положительно скажется на вашем физическом и моральном состоянии. Понимаю, у наследника торговой империи полно дел, но и об отдыхе не стоит забывать".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость?" {n}Канцлер отрывается от чтения инфопластины.{/n} "Надеюсь, пребывание на Даргонусе положительно скажется на вашем физическом и моральном состоянии. Понимаю, у наследника протектората полно дел, но и об отдыхе не стоит забывать".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a trade empire must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a trade empire must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a trade empire must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

languages.text: “大人？”{n}克莱门缇雅从数据板上移开了视线。{/n}“希望您在达戈努斯停留的这段时间里，您的身体与精神都得到恢复。我明白，王朝的继承人确实总是在忙个不停，不过也请不要忘记休息。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

traits.locale_text: “大人？”{n}克莱门缇雅从数据板上移开了视线。{/n}“希望您在达戈努斯停留的这段时间里，您的身体与精神都得到恢复。我明白，王朝的继承人确实总是在忙个不停，不过也请不要忘记休息。”

languages.text: «¿Mi{mf|lord|lady}?» {n}Clementia aparta la vista de su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Espero que su estancia en Dargonus sea provechosa para su estado físico y mental. Entiendo que como hereder{mf|o|a} del protectorado tiene las manos llenas, pero no se olvide de descansar».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

traits.locale_text: «¿Mi{mf|lord|lady}?» {n}Clementia aparta la vista de su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Espero que su estancia en Dargonus sea provechosa para su estado físico y mental. Entiendo que como hereder{mf|o|a} del protectorado tiene las manos llenas, pero no se olvide de descansar».

languages.text: 「陛下？」{n}クレメンティアがデータスレートから顔を上げる。{/n}「ダルゴナスでの滞在で心身ともに癒されることを願っております。保護領の後継者という立場上、手一杯なのはわかりますが、休むことも忘れてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下？」{n}クレメンティアがデータスレートから顔を上げる。{/n}「ダルゴナスでの滞在で心身ともに癒されることを願っております。保護領の後継者という立場上、手一杯なのはわかりますが、休むことも忘れてはなりません」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Clementia blickt von ihrem Datablock auf.{/n} "Hoffentlich ist Euer Aufenthalt auf Dargonus von Vorteil für Euren körperlichen und geistigen Zustand. Mir ist klar, dass {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin} eines Protektorats viel zu tun hat, aber man sollte darüber den Rest nicht vergessen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Clementia blickt von ihrem Datablock auf.{/n} "Hoffentlich ist Euer Aufenthalt auf Dargonus von Vorteil für Euren körperlichen und geistigen Zustand. Mir ist klar, dass {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin} eines Protektorats viel zu tun hat, aber man sollte darüber den Rest nicht vergessen."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}Clémentia lève les yeux de sa plaque de données.{/n} « J'espère que votre séjour sur Dargonus vous permettra de reposer aussi bien votre corps que votre esprit. Je sais que l'{mf|héritier|héritière} d'un protectorat doit avoir beaucoup de choses à gérer, mais il est également important de prendre le temps de se ressourcer. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}Clémentia lève les yeux de sa plaque de données.{/n} « J'espère que votre séjour sur Dargonus vous permettra de reposer aussi bien votre corps que votre esprit. Je sais que l'{mf|héritier|héritière} d'un protectorat doit avoir beaucoup de choses à gérer, mais il est également important de prendre le temps de se ressourcer. »

languages.text: "Efendim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?" {n}Clementia, gözlerini elindeki databeladan kaldırıyor.{/n} "Umarım Dargonus'ta geçirdiğiniz vakit, hem fiziksel hem de zihinsel sağlığınıza iyi gelir. Protektora vârislerinin işi başından aşkın oluyor, farkındayım ama yine de istirahat olmazsa olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}Clementia looks away from her data-slate.{/n} "I hope your stay on Dargonus will be beneficial to your physical and mental state. I understand that the heir to a protectorate must have {mf|his|her} hands full, but one shouldn't forget about rest."

traits.locale_text: "Efendim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?" {n}Clementia, gözlerini elindeki databeladan kaldırıyor.{/n} "Umarım Dargonus'ta geçirdiğiniz vakit, hem fiziksel hem de zihinsel sağlığınıza iyi gelir. Protektora vârislerinin işi başından aşkın oluyor, farkındayım ama yine de istirahat olmazsa olmaz."
